name: Mushroom Rush
description:
You are the Mushroom king, drag your units on the left side of the board to beat the evil king. But be careful, you have only 7 seconds to do so !

Quick advice from your strategist :

    • Red mushrooms are very effective against Green mushrooms.
    • Blue mushrooms are very effective against Red mushrooms.
    • Green mushrooms are very effective against Blue mushrooms.
